网络异常, 请检查您的网络设置: Network exception, please check your network settings
您的设备可能未启用移动网络或WI-FI网络，可以参照以下方法进行设置: The mobile network or WI-FI network may not be enabled on your device. You can perform the following operations to set the mobile network or Wi-Fi network
设置面板选择一个可用的Wi-Fi接入: Settings panel selects an available Wi-Fi access
如果您已经接入WiFi网络: If you are already connected to a WiFi network
请检查该Wi-Fi热点是否已经接入互联网，或该Wi-Fi是否允许你的设备访问互联: Check to see if the Wi-Fi hotspot is connected to the Internet or if the Wi-Fi allows your device to access the Internet
请求超时, 请稍候重试: Request timeout, please try again later
正在为您更新，请耐心等待: It is being updated for you, please be patient
获取服务供应商失败: Failed to obtain a service provider
请你务必审慎阅读、充分理解“服务协议”和“隐私政策”各条款，包括但不限于：为了更: Please read carefully and fully underst “Service Agreement” and “Privacy Policy” Terms, including but not limited to：In order to better provide services to you, we need to collect your device identification, operation logs and other information for analysis and optimization of application performance
了解详细信息。如果你同意，请点击下面按钮开始接受我们的服务: Learn more. If you agree, please click the button below to start receiving our services
